formElement.label: P4PORT (host:port):
formElement.documentation: The host name and port number of the Perforce server specified as host:port.

formElement.label: P4TICKETS:
formElement.documentation: The location of a ticket file for user authentication.

formElement.label: P4CHARSET:
formElement.documentation: Character set used for translation of unicode files.

formElement.label: P4COMMANDCHARSET:
formElement.documentation: Used to support UTF-16 and UTF-32 character sets from the command-line client.

formElement.label: P4HOST (override):
formElement.documentation: Overrides the real name of the Perforce client machine so that the Perforce server treats the request as coming from the specified client machine.
